doc: ['Citizen-centered big data analysis-driven governance intelligence framework for smart city .', 'Sensor and system within rapidly expanding smart city produce citizen-centered big data which have potential value to support citizen-centered urban governance decision-making .', 'There exists a wealth of extant conceptual study , however , further operational study are needed to establish a specific path towards implementation of such data to governance decision-making with analytical algorithms that are appropriate for each step of the path .', 'This paper proposes a framework for the use of citizen-centered big data analysis to drive governance intelligence in smart city from two perspective : urban governance issue and data-analysis algorithms .', 'The framework consists of three layer : 1 ) A data-merging layer , which builds a citizen-centered panoramic data set for each citizen by merging citizen-related big data from multiple source in collaborative urban governance via similarity calculation and conflict resolution ; 2 ) a knowledge-discovery layer , which plots the citizen profile and citizen persona at both individual and group level in term of urban public service delivery and citizen participation via simple statistical analysis technique , machine learning , and econometrics method ; and 3 ) a decision-making layer , which uses ontology model to standardize urban governance-related attribute , persona , and association to support governance decision-making via data mining and Bayesian Net technique .', 'Finally , the proposed framework is validated in a case study on blood donation governance in China .', 'This research highlights the value of citizen-centered big data , push data-to-decision research from conceptual to operational , synthesizes previously published framework for citizen-centered big data analysis in smart city , and enhances the mutual supplement cross multiple disciplinaries .', 'Semantic framework of internet of thing for smart city : Case study .', 'In recent year , the advancement of sensor technology has led to the generation of heterogeneous Internet-of-things ( IoT ) data by smart city .', 'Thus , the development and deployment of various aspect of IoT-based application are necessary to mine the potential value of data to the benefit of people and their life .', 'However , the variety , volume , heterogeneity , and real-time nature of data obtained from smart city pose considerable challenge .', 'In this paper , we propose a semantic framework that integrates the IoT with machine learning for smart city .', 'The proposed framework retrieves and model urban data for certain kind of IoT application based on semantic and machine-learning technology .', 'Moreover , we propose two case study : pollution detection from vehicle and traffic pattern detection .', 'The experimental result show that our system is scalable and capable of accommodating a large number of urban region with different type of IoT application .', 'PSO-ELM : A Hybrid Learning Model for Short-Term Traffic Flow Forecasting .', 'Accurate and reliable traffic flow forecasting is of importance for urban planning and mitigation of traffic congestion , and it is also the basis for the deployment of intelligent traffic management system .', 'However , constructing a reasonable and robust forecasting model is a challenging task due to the uncertainty and nonlinear characteristic of traffic flow .', 'Aiming at the nonlinear relationship affecting traffic flow forecasting effect , a PSO-ELM model based on particle swarm optimization is proposed for short-term traffic flow forecasting , which takes the advantage of particle swarm optimization to search global optimal solution and extreme learning machine to fast deal with the nonlinear relationship .', 'The proposed model improves the accuracy of traffic flow forecasting .', "The traffic flow data from highway A1 , A2 , A4 , A8 connecting to Amsterdam 's ring road are employed for the case study .", 'The RMSEs of PSO-ELM model are respectively 252.61 , 173.75 , 200.24 , 146.05 , while the MAPEs of PSO-ELM model are respectively 11.86 % , 10.10 % , 10.74 % , 11.60 % .', 'The experimental result show that the performance of the proposal is significantly better than the performance of state-of-the-art model .', 'Strategway : Web solution city resident .', "The idea behind the solution is to use collected data about city resident ' transportation need ( resident ' preference ) and to build an optimal route network minimizing total cost of ownership .", 'As transportation preference of people are represented as a large set of geoobjects , machine learning algorithm were modified to take geodata specific into account .', 'Strategway includes the analytics core for data gathering , clustering and route design based on machine learning technique .', 'These feature can be considered as contribution in smart algorithms for urban planning system .', 'Pseudocode of main algorithms with novel addition are represented in the paper as the result of some case study .', 'Future work is declared in the end to highlight the way of contribution to the domain of analytics as a web service .', 'Inferring Pedestrian Motion at Urban Crosswalks .', 'Robust prediction of pedestrian behavior is one of the most challenging problem for autonomous driving .', 'Particularly , predicting pedestrian crossing at crosswalk is of considerable importance for avoiding accident on the one hand and not unnecessarily slowing down traffic on the other hand .', 'Traditional model-based motion tracking and prediction approach have difficulty in capturing abrupt change in motion , as human can perform them .', 'In this paper , an approach for predicting pedestrian motion that combine established motion tracking algorithm with data-driven method is presented .', 'The approach is built upon a hierarchical structure , where first , the intent of each pedestrian is classified .', 'Then , the approach computes several qualitative metric , such as time-to-cross , for the pedestrian classified as crossing .', 'The approach is evaluated on a challenging urban data set collected for different type of crosswalk such as roundabout and straight road .', 'The evaluation also provides a thorough analysis of the generalization performance of the proposed approach .', 'Automated urban travel interpretation : A bottom-up approach for trajectory segmentation .', 'Understanding travel behavior is critical for an effective urban planning as well as for enabling various context-aware service provision to support mobility as a service ( MaaS ) .', 'Both application rely on the sensor trace generated by traveller ’ smartphones .', 'These trace can be used to interpret travel mode , both for generating automated travel diary as well as for real-time travel mode detection .', 'Current approach segment a trajectory by certain criterion , e.g.', ', drop in speed .', 'However , these criterion are heuristic , and , thus , existing approach are subjective and involve significant vagueness and uncertainty in activity transition in space and time .', 'Also , segmentation approach are not suited for real time interpretation of open-ended segment , and can not cope with the frequent gap in the location trace .', 'In order to address all these challenges a novel , state based bottom-up approach is proposed .', 'This approach assumes a fixed atomic segment of a homogeneous state , instead of an event-based segment , and a progressive iteration until a new state is found .', 'The research investigates how an atomic state-based approach can be developed in such a way that can work in real time , near-real time and offline mode and in different environmental condition with their varying quality of sensor trace .', 'The result show the proposed bottom-up model outperforms the existing event-based segmentation model in term of adaptivity , flexibility , accuracy and richness in information delivery pertinent to automated travel behavior interpretation .', 'Safe reinforcement learning with scene decomposition for navigating complex urban environment .', 'Navigating urban environment represents a complex task for automated vehicle .', 'They must reach their goal safely and efficiently while considering a multitude of traffic participant .', 'We propose a modular decision making algorithm to autonomously navigate intersection , addressing challenge of existing rule-based and reinforcement learning ( RL ) approach .', 'We first present a safe RL algorithm relying on a model-checker to ensure safety guarantee .', 'To make the decision strategy robust to perception error and occlusion , we introduce a belief update technique using a learning based approach .', 'Finally , we use a scene decomposition approach to scale our algorithm to environment with multiple traffic participant .', 'We empirically demonstrate that our algorithm outperforms rule-based method and reinforcement learning technique on a complex intersection scenario .', 'Smart mobile crowdsensing with urban vehicle : A deep reinforcement learning perspective .', 'Mobile crowdsensing ( MCS ) is a promising sensing paradigm based on the mobile node which provides the solution with cost-effectiveness to perform urban data collection .', 'To monitor the urban environment and facilitate the municipal administration , more and more application adopt vehicle as participant to carry out MCS task .', 'The performance of the application highly depends on the sensing data which is influenced by the recruiting strategy on vehicle .', 'In this paper , we propose a novel vehicle selection algorithm to maximize the sensing range with limited cost while the vehicle selection problem was proved to be NP-complete .', 'Specifically , we modeled the interaction between MCS server and candidate vehicle as a Markov decision process and formulated the maximum spatial temporal coverage ( STC ) optimization as a deep reinforcement learning process .', 'The performance of our deep reinforcement learning-based vehicle selection ( i.e.', ', DRLVS ) algorithm is evaluated with real trajectory dataset .', 'The numerical result indicates that the proposed algorithm achieves an optimal solution and maximizes the STC .', 'Using abstraction to solve opportunistic crime security game at scale .', 'In this paper , we aim to deter urban crime by recommending optimal police patrol strategy against opportunistic criminal in large scale urban problem .', "While previous work has tried to learn criminal ' behavior from real world data and generate patrol strategy against opportunistic crime , it can not scale up to large-scale urban problem .", 'Our first contribution is a game abstraction framework that can handle opportunistic crime in large-scale urban area .', 'In this game abstraction framework , we model the interaction between officer and opportunistic criminal as a game with discrete target .', 'By merging similar target , we obtain an abstract game with fewer total target .', 'We use real world data to learn and plan against opportunistic criminal in this abstract game , and then propagate the result of this abstract game back to the original game .', 'Our second contribution is the layer-generating algorithm used to merge target as described in the framework above .', 'This algorithm applies a mixed integer linear program ( MILP ) to merge similar and geographically neighboring target in the large scale problem .', 'As our third contribution , we propose a planning algorithm that recommends a mixed strategy against opportunistic criminal .', 'Finally , our fourth contribution is a heuristic propagation model to handle the problem of limited data we occasionally encounter in large-scale problem .', 'As part of our collaboration with local police department , we apply our model in two large scale urban problem : a university campus and a city .', 'Our approach provides high prediction accuracy in the real datasets ; furthermore , we project significant crime rate reduction using our planning strategy compared to current police strategy .', 'Detecting Transportation Modes Based on LightGBM Classifier from GPS Trajectory Data .', 'Human travel behavior can be obtained from the trajectory data generated by GPS device , which can be reflected in different transportation mode and provide useful information for trajectory prediction , urban planning and traffic monitoring .', 'In this article , we proposed transportation mode classification method based on Light Gradient Boosting Machine ( LightGBM ) to discover seven kind of transportation mode from GPS trajectory data , including walking , cycling , taking a bus , taking a taxi , driving a car , taking the subway and taking a train .', 'First , the original trajectory must be divided into some sub trajectory .', 'There is only one transportation mode label in each sub trajectory .', 'Second , the feature vector of sub trajectory is computed including eight basic and three advanced feature .', 'These basic feature are distance feature , five velocity-related feature and two acceleration-related feature .', 'Three advanced feature are heading change rate ( hcr ) , stop rate ( sr ) and velocity change rate ( vcr ) , Final , the LightGBM classifier is used to detect the transportation modes automatically .', 'The eXtreme Gradient Boosting ( XGBoost ) and decision tree are also used
